import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '@auth0/auth0-angular'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavMenuComponent { isExpanded = false; isAuthenticated$ = this.authService.isAuthenticated$; constructor(private authService: AuthService) { } collapse() { this.isExpanded = false; } toggle() { this.isExpanded = !this.isExpanded; } }
